Okay, after searching through the net I found a possible solution.

If anyone is experiancing problems installing this on a 32-bit system, you have to do a clean install to get to 64-bit. 32bit cannot run on 64bit if that makes sense. Make sure you backup your stuff or move them somewhere safe, then clean install. This is only for 32-bit to 64bit.

One other thing, you MUST run this during bootup, not when your on your desktop. So burn the files onto a disc then run it during bootup.
